example.parse: (S (LST (PUNC -)) (VP (IV يمكننا) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM استخدام) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البنزين)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ الخالي) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرصاص)))))) (PP-MNR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN امان))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN محركات) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاحتراق) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الداخلي))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الصغيرة))) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN محرقات) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الدراجات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN النارية)))))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC شرط) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S تكون) (NP-SBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_FS تلك)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM المحركات))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC متوافقة) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البنزين)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ الخالي) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرصاص)))))))))))) (PUNC .)))
